dataIdInfo.idPurp: Point locations of NYC Public Schools

idPoC.rpOrgName: New York City Department of Education

resMaint.maintNote: Scheduled for update annually. Additional updates if provided for error correction or informational update.

Consts.useLimit: Data is intended for reference only.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414

mdMaint.maintNote: Scheduled for update annually. Additional updates if provided for error correction or informational update.

Consts.useLimit: Data is intended for reference only.

dqReport.measDesc: Data is valid for the NYC School Year of 2011-2012

dataLineage.statement: Derived from data representing the 2010-2011 School Year

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Commonly known as DBN (District, Borough, Number)

edom.edomvd: 84 identifies the school as a Charter School and is not the actual Geographic District

attr.attrdef: DOE Internal reference unique reference code
Address of Primary Location for the School
